channel.title: Comments on: Fruit Face
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: By: Matthew
item.dc:creator: Matthew
item.description: Awesome flavor. If you love fruit flavors then I would definitely recommend this juice. Will definitely get it again. I’m glad my friend introduced me to cloud chemistry. The people are great there and so is the juice
item.content:encoded: Awesome flavor. If you love fruit flavors then I would definitely recommend this juice. Will definitely get it again. I’m glad my friend introduced me to cloud chemistry. The people are great there and so is the juice
